episodes.title: IT'S NOT YOUR JOB TO BE THE PERFECT SURVIVOR?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
CORINNE & KRYSTYNA WROTE A FUCKING BOOK ENTITLED FUCKED, CAN YOU FUCKING BELIEVE IT??

Pre-order it today to get a shout-out on the podcast & so that they like you the best (oh, and it's cheaper if you do it now and stuff): http://www.sorryaboutlastnightcomedy.com/book/ <----

On today's episode of #GuysWeFucked, Corinne & Krystyna announce their fancy book then welcome guests of the documentary, The Hunting Ground, Andrea Pino & Annie Clark. The four women discuss what it's like to have a sexual assault define you in the eyes of others, taking down a 200-year-old university, why it's hard to talk about sexual violence when people aren't even comfortable talking about sex, social media justice, and why it's not a survivor's responsibility to tell their story.

episodes.title: HAVE YOU EVER HEARD ME & STEPHEN HAVE SEX?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
Krystyna has lived in the same apartment with the same Super for almost a decade, but what's his life across the hallway really like? On this week's episode of Guys We Fucked, Corinne & Krystyna sit down with ex correctional officer, TONY, to discuss working at Rikers, that time he accidentally ended up in a brothel, going on little, innocent, non-sexual dates (LOL) when you're married, getting locked into a relationship with a pregnancy, male daddy issues, and why ya still gotta fuck even if your wife's mom is dying. PLUS: What to do when your girlfriend finds your gay porn.

episodes.title: WHAT CAN WHITE WOMEN BE DOING BETTER?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
Corinne & Krystyna are back from London and boy did they have a delightful time! Join the gals as they swoop back into American culture with this week's guest -- writer, pop culture commentator, and co-host of The Read podcast, CRISSLE! After bonding with Krystyna over Beyoncé, Crissle talks learning Sex Ed from a Christian pamphlet, dating in Oklahoma, how it was to go from fucking vaginas to fucking penises, the logic behind being a cold-hearted bitch, white feminism, and how white women can be better allies to black women. episodes.title: HOW CAN YOU STILL LOVE ME?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
On a very special episode of GWF, the girls of Sorry About Last Night sit down with KRYSTYNA'S MOM! Mrs. Hutchinson guides us through a vocal memoir that is part comedy, part drama, and all genuine with the heart and wisdom only a mother can have. We know her story will move you, her openness about depression may help you, and her laundry list of ailments will make you go, "Wow, I didn't even know you could have all those things at once!" Enjoy <3

episodes.title: YOU DIDN'T WANT TO WANT THIS?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
After Corinne describes a visit from a ghost of dating past, the girls sit down with 68-year-old author, performer, advocate, and gender outlaw KATE BORNSTEIN to talk about what it was like to get gender confirmation surgery in the 80s, how you turn a penis into a vagina, sex for a trans person, advice for young people going through similar struggles, 101 alternatives to suicide, and a whole bunch of other stuff just for the fun of it. Really, anything that's not mean. PLUS: Orange Is The New Black isn't even as close to as bad as it gets. 

SPECIAL THANKS TO THOMAS WHITFIELD FOR RECOMMENDING KATE <3

BUY GENDER OUTLAW (re-release) BY KATE BORNSTEIN: https://www.amazon.com/Gender-Outlaws-Generation-Kate-Bornstein/dp/1580053084

episodes.title: IF YOU CRIED, THEY WON?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
HAPPY NEW YEAR, #FUCKERS! Krystyna found some zen, Corinne found a sport she's actually good at, and, if you're a female comedian, you'll find out open mics feature a lot of men making rape jokes. On today's episode of #GuysWeFucked, comedian/producer/writer CALISE HAWKINS sits down with the gals of Sorry About Last Night to overshare -- her specialty! From her days as a Pound Puppy toting bully's dream to her transformation into an attractive mom ready to learn from millennials and forget her ex ever existed, Calise is constantly playing with identity. PLUS: TIPS FOR FUTURE CAM GIRLS & SUGAR BABIES FROM PEOPLE WHO HAVE NEVER BEEN CAM GIRLS OR SUGAR BABIES!

episodes.title: YOU GHOSTED YOUR HUSBAND?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
A serious plea from Krystyna. A letter from a woman who would've been a house slave. This episode is a funny sandwich on some heavy bread. Today, Corinne & Krystyna welcome comedian and podcaster, MARA MAREK. Mara's probably done a lot more than you. She's probably been married more than you, she's probably been divorced more than you, she's probably done more drugs than you, drank more alcohol than you, and also had a lot more fun than you. Oh, btw, we also talk about that time she was forced into sex trafficking. Ya know, just in passing.

episodes.title: DO PEOPLE ASK IF YOU'RE CONFUSED?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
You're either a woman or a man, right? Well, no. On this week's episode, Corinne & Krystyna finally sit down and talk with a person who identifies as non-binary. Their name is SAM ESCOBAR, they're a Senior Editor at Bustle, and they're pretty fucking cool. From the pronouns to the Internet comments to the dating to the fact that non-binary is NOT trans, the three sluts cover it all. Yes, non-binary folks can be sluts, too (some even have it tattooed to their body). PLUS: NO MATTER YOUR RELATIONSHIP STATUS WITH 'EM, CALL YOUR FUCKING PARENTS FOR THE HOLIDAYS!

After years of lying to friends and family, blaming herself, and being manipulated and stalked, she is finally ready to share her experience with the very podcast that helped her become the sexually enlightened young woman she is today. PLUS: Why it's not a good idea to fuck your wife's sister and the shocking announcement that threesomes are not EVERYONE'S sexual fantasy.

episodes.title: AM I BEING BRAINWASHED BY PORN?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
Today's episode is brought to you by Third Love & Square Space!

You know they fucking hate this word, but even Corinne & Krystyna have to admit that this week's guest, MIKE BROWN (no, not that one, another one), is brave. After coming to terms with the fact that he is addicted to porn, Mormon Mike Brown sought help via Facebook, group meetings, Ted Talks, Terry Crews videos, prayer, and, as of this week, therapy. Mike enlightens the girls of Sorry About Last Night on what porn addiction (and all addiction) does to the brain, how porn addiction changes how he views women, how it has ruined his real life relationships, how it has made him feel like he wasn't good enough, why he decided to come out publicly about his addiction, and the difference between guilt and shame.
PLUS: An Australian teen thanks the podcast for making her feel cool about her virginity! (Yay!!)

episodes.title: WHAT'S IT LIKE BEING 15?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
The girls just flew back from North Carolina AND BOY ARE THEIR ARMS TIRED! While Krystyna reflects on the awesome masturbation sesh she had in her private Chapel Hill hotel room, Corinne got off the airplane and wasted no time going on a trip of a different color. This week, the girls of Sorry About Last Night make a checkmark on their bucket list with 15-year-old guest RUBY! Ruby comes into the studio with some super stressful boy problems, but leaves Corinne & Krystyna much wiser than they entered. Ruby sheds light on what it's like to be overly mature (mentally and physically), the high school stigma of being a single virgin, drug use, slut-shaming amongst friends, Sex Ed, growing up with a single mom, and the constant struggle to not dumb yourself down to make yourself more attractive to males. PLUS: Tips to keep your long-term relationship going strong as long as you both shall live!

The girls from Sorry About Last Night and their guest, Andy from the band SHARK?, discuss topics such as female masturbation (hand v. vibrator) and period sex as well as pitch a few great dick-themed shows for VH1. Krystyna tells the story of how her ovary burst (it involves a big, black cock), Corinne explains how to know if your relationship is broken from the inside and Andy defends Brett Favre's dick -- FINALLY!

DRINK-A-LONG!
Also, don't forget to keep a bottle of whiskey close-by to participate in the GUYS WE FUCKED Drinking Game! Take a shot every time Corinne mentions her ex-boyfriend or Krystyna talks about how her current boyfriend used to date a porn star.

Follow @PhilanthropyGal (Corinne) and @KrystynaHutch (Krystyna) @SryAboutLastNyt (both of them) and @standupnylabs. Visit www.StandUpNY.com to get tickets to Stand Up NY and go to www.StandUpNYLabs.com to listen to all our other great podcasts.

episodes.title: AUSTIN: DO YOU LIKE GETTING YOUR ASS LICKED?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary: Bum's the word on this ba-dunk-a-dunk heavy episode of Guys We Fucked!  Krystyna takes the lead as the ladies of Sorry About Last Night interview Corinne's serious ex-boyfriend, Austin, about ass-play, his peculiar porn, peeing on people and why Corinne refuses to meet peoples' moms.  Krystyna reveals her secret to pleasuring her boyfriend better than his porn star ex-girlfriend and Corinne is in a rush because she needs to go fuck her future husband post-podcast.

episodes.title: NICO: DO I HAVE ANY BLACK FRIENDS?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary: Corinne and Krystyna have spent the afternoon nursing vicious hangovers courtesy of Stand Up NY's Halloween party the night before, but they stop shitting and puking long enough to sit down with Nico, Krystyna's ex-kinda-sorta-never-official-boyfriend. Nico, a Latino man, reveals that Latina women aren't as crazy in bed as one would think and Krystyna reveals she wasn't the expert in a certain sexually explicit act that Nico thought she was. Also, Corinne fucked some guy in a sex suit the night before.

episodes.title: VINNIE: CAN I CHOKE YOU?
episodes.author: Krystyna Hutchinson and Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary: Fresh off Corinne's one night stand with Anthony from Atlantic City and Krystyna's experience being mistaken for a stripper by a comedy club barker, the women from Sorry About Last Night welcome their first podcast guest, Vinnie, into the lab to discuss his dick size (big), squirting (according to Krystyna's bf, anyone can do it!) and how Corinne was the first person to ever choke Vinnie in bed. Did he like it? Listen and find out.
